vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.GetFreebie (patch_3.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_3.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_3.sol#15)

external-function

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_3.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway2.Command (patch_3.sol#27-30):
	-require(bool)(adr.call.value(msg.value)(data)) patch_3.sol#29
